name: GRAY'S ADVENTURE
description:
Welcome to Gray's Adventure
  This is our first game
 A challenging 2d action platformer
 with different puzzles and enemies to overcome.
  
JOIN GRAY on his adventure to explore a mysterious 
and wild planet full of challenges and all kinds 
of dangerous creatures. 
 
Will you be able to discover all the secrets of this planet?
  A great adventure is waiting for you...
